'''Robert "Rob" Pattinson''' (born [[13 May]] [[1986]] in [[London]], [[England]]) is an [[England|English]] [[actor]] and model, best known for playing [[Cedric Diggory]] in ''[[Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (film)|Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire]]''. He has been cast as [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]] in the highly anticipated [[Twilight (2008 film)|film adaptation]] of ''[[Twilight (novel)|Twilight]]'', a novel by [[Stephenie Meyer]].
+
'''Robert "Rob" Pattinson''' (born [[13 May]] [[1986]] in [[London]], [[England]]) is an [[England|English]] [[actor]] and model, best known for playing [[Cedric Diggory]] in ''[[Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (film)|Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire]]''. He has been cast as [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]] in the highly anticipated [[Twilight (2008 film)|film adaptation]] of ''[[Twilight (novel)|Twilight]]'', a novel by [[Stephenie Meyer]].
Pattinson names [[Jack Nicholson]] as his acting inspiration.
Pattinson names [[Jack Nicholson]] as his acting inspiration.
Line 24: Line 24:
Pattinson appeared in the advertising campaign for [[Hackett (clothing store)|Hackett]]'s Autumn 2007 collection. He has a role in the as-yet unreleased [[short subject|short]] ''[[The Summer House]]'', and the film ''[[Little Ashes]]'' (in which he plays [[Salvador Dali]]).
Pattinson appeared in the advertising campaign for [[Hackett (clothing store)|Hackett]]'s Autumn 2007 collection. He has a role in the as-yet unreleased [[short subject|short]] ''[[The Summer House]]'', and the film ''[[Little Ashes]]'' (in which he plays [[Salvador Dali]]).
â
On December 11th, 2007, [[Summit Entertainment]] announced that Pattinson will play [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]] in the upcoming movie ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]'', based on [[Stephenie Meyer]]'s bestselling vampire/romance novel of the same name. A very good decision as he is irresistible just like Edward.
+
On December 11th, 2007, [[Summit Entertainment]] announced that Pattinson will play [[Edward Cullen (Twilight)|Edward Cullen]] in the upcoming movie ''[[Twilight (2008 film)|Twilight]]'', based on [[Stephenie Meyer]]'s bestselling vampire/romance novel of the same name.
